pkgmetadata.longdescription: Forkgram is a fork of the official Telegram Desktop application. It does not fundamentally change the official client but adds small useful features such as optional stories, pin management improvements, and restrictions on invite peeking and saving.

use.flag: Enable D-Bus support for desktop integration
Use app-text/enchant spell-checking backend instead of app-text/hunspell
Use built-in patched copy of open-sans fonts (overrides fontconfig)
Use dev-libs/libdispatch for better thread pool performance
